text: General elections were held in Paraguay on 6 February 1983.Nohlen, D (2005) Elections in the Americas: A data handbook, Volume II, p425 Alfredo Stroessner of the Colorado Party won the presidential elections, whilst the Colorado Party won 20 of the 30 seats in the Senate and 40 of the 60 seats in the Chamber of Deputues. Voter turnout was 92.6%.Nohlen, p426 ==Results== ===President=== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !Candidate !Party !Votes !% |- |align=left|Alfredo Stroessner||align=left|Colorado Party||944,637||91.0 |- |align=left|Enzo Doldan||align=left|Radical Liberal Party||59,094||5.7 |- |align=left|Fulvio Hugo Celauro||align=left|Liberal Party||34,010||3.3 |- |align=left colspan=2|Invalid/blank votes||11,255||– |- |align=left colspan=2|Total||1,048,996||100 |- |align=left colspan=4|Source: Nohlen |} ===Senate=== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !Party !Votes !% !Seats !+/- |- |align=left|Colorado Party|| || ||20||0 |- |align=left|Radical Liberal Party|| || ||6|| |- |align=left|Liberal Party|| || ||4|| |- |align=left|Invalid/blank votes|| ||–||–||– |- |align=left|Total|| || ||30||0 |- |align=left colspan=5|Source: IPU, The Europa World Year Book 1985 |} ===Chamber of Deputies=== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !Party !Votes !% !Seats !+/- |- |align=left|Colorado Party||944,637||91.0||40||0 |- |align=left|Radical Liberal Party||59,094||5.7||13||-3 |- |align=left|Liberal Party||34,010||3.3||7||+3 |- |align=left|Invalid/blank votes||11,255||–||–||– |- |align=left|Total||1,048,996||100||60||0 |- |align=left colspan=5|Source: Nohlen, The Europa World Year Book 1985 |} ==References== Category:1983 elections in South America Category:1983 in Paraguay Category:Elections in Paraguay 1983 Category:Alfredo Stroessner Category:February 1983 events in South America
title: 1983 Paraguayan general election
